ygData.subject: Come See our Erotic Fantasy Art Group... Tons of original paintings...
ygData.msgSnippet: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/tabookingdom/ Come see all the artwork we have posted! If you love RPG s or fantasy related art in general you ll love this
ygData.messageBody:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/tabookingdom/

Come see all the artwork we have posted! If you love RPG's or fantasy
related art in general you'll love this group. EQ players will find
some great art here...

Whether your into seeing Human warriors, or breathtakingly beautiful
Elves you'll find what your looking for in the Taboo Kingdom...

All art is done by our art staff and new paintings are being added
all the time...

Stop by and check us out, you'll be glad you did...

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/tabookingdom/

-Xxxavier
